description: An adjustment line related to a single charnge against a sales order entity (SOH, SOL).  Multiple charges lines are possible (1:*), thus this line object is typically in an array

ChargeId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze Charge ID, if identifiable, format Charge_[SourceSystem]_[Number] e.g Charge_D365_AD123456

ChargeNumber.description: The natural Charge number / key, if identifiable e.g AD123456

ChargeCode.description: The unique code of the charge

ChargeType.description: The type of the Charge e.g Service, Fee, ProductUsage

ChargePurpose.description: The purpose of the Charge e.g Usage, Penalty

ChargeDesc.description: The description of the Charge instance

Status.description: The collection of Status for this Charge

Times.description: The collection of key Time points for this Charge

Totals.description: The collection of possible totals, related to the Charge.  Actual usage and ability to populate depends on the richness of the sources..

GLCode.description: A GL code associated with this Charge

ReasonCode.description: The reason code for this Charge

ReasonDesc.description: The reason desc for this Charge

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
